original_text: When anyone came to a heap of twenty measures, there were only ten. When anyone went to a wine vat to draw fifty measures, there were only twenty.
korean_text: 그 때에는 이십 고르 곡식 더미에 이른즉 십 고르뿐이었고 포도즙 틀에 오십 고르를 길으러 이른즉 이십 고르뿐이었었느니라

sentences.original_text: When anyone came to a heap of twenty measures
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 이십 세마의 곡식 단에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: When anyone went to a wine vat
